channel.title: Cheat Client
channel.description: What are cheat clients, how do you use them, and where do you get them?

item.title: Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:2, topic:320029”]not allowd i dnt think they ruin the concept of rsps[/quote]Isn’t the concept of RSPS virtual freedom of the wrath of Jagex(Fagex) and their communist RuneScape?
Cheat client’s don’t affect this concept.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

cows1471:

they ruin the concept of rsps

The people ruin the concept of rsps.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:320029”][quote author=cows1471 link=topic=416486.msg3062776#msg3062776 date=1260991069]
not allowd i dnt think they ruin the concept of rsps
[/quote]

Why would they not be allowed? MoparScape itself has a bot built in (Aryan) to bot and cheat on servers. The reason I don’t have a problem with them is twofold. One is that private servers and indeed this entire site evolved out of a runescape cheating community (moparisthebest.com), the other reason was stated above. If the servers were even remotely close to decently programmed no ‘cheat client’ would work at all. You would only be able to bot on them and with some good programming you could even detect and stop that.[/quote]

Even with some mediocre-intermediate programming you could detect and stop it.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

cows1471:

not allowd i dnt think they ruin the concept of rsps

Why would they not be allowed? MoparScape itself has a bot built in (Aryan) to bot and cheat on servers. The reason I don’t have a problem with them is twofold. One is that private servers and indeed this entire site evolved out of a runescape cheating community (moparisthebest.com), the other reason was stated above. If the servers were even remotely close to decently programmed no ‘cheat client’ would work at all. You would only be able to bot on them and with some good programming you could even detect and stop that.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

krackkid:

There have been a lot of them for download, but basically they ruin the servers, they allow the people to do commands such as no-click/go invisible, all by just using the client.

Some have set item,appear as admin etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Cheat Client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

A server that’s programmed well should be invincible to cheat clients.

Read full topic
